data.message:
Story about eminem Story of eminem
 1.failed consecutively in 9th for 3 years.
 2.His MOTHER USED TO TAKE DRUGS AND NEVER
 BOTHERED FOR HIM.
 3.His Friends always beat him in toilets and near the
 lockers.
 4.He was a very weak student.
 5.HE WAS DIVORCED IN 90'S.
 6.again married with his divorced wife and divorced in the
 same year.
 7.Tried suicide but saved by the doctors.
 8.Left drugs and again started singing new songs.
 TODAY EMINEM IS A PHENOMENON .HE HAS WON 13
 GRAMMY AWARDS AND HAS MORE THAN 80 MILLION
 FANS ON FACEBOOK.
 ''NEVER GIVE UP" TILL I COLLAPSE

replies.message: He didn't try to commit suicide he overdosed which doesn't mean u want to die it means u took too much. Get your facts straight before u go sharing fake information and research properly. Where he talks about collapsing in the bathroom when he overdosed
actually eminem did try to commit suicide before he met dr.dre has he could not take it anymore with the drugs, bullying and family issus and the fact that no one would sign him
Watch this  and read it carefully http://www.foxnews.com/story/2009/09/17/eminem-biography/
how about you read this and look at number 8 http://allhiphop.com/2014/02/26/15-facts-about-eminem-before-the-slim-shady-lp/
they are wrong he did overdose but before that he tried suicide
Fuck it who told fox is wrong
